# 第八讲：图形语法与数据可视化
## 载入数据
```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
economist <- read_csv("data/EconomistData.csv")

p1 <- ggplot(economist, aes(x = CPI, y = HDI))
p2 <- p1 + geom_point()
print(p2)



```
